post.content:
Thursday, October 21, 2004 (EST) - Building Mobile Applications using .NET CF speaker: Adam Gallant location: Microsoft Canada, 1950 Meadowvale Blvd, Mississauga
Click here to Register
This presentation will focus on building Mobile applications using the .NET Compact Framework and SQL CE.
http://www.torontoug.net/UG_Events/711.aspx
post.title: Building Mobile Applications using .NET CF
